name: Maze Breakout
description:
Objective:  You are in a maze. You have a gun in your hands.  What do you do? Kill zombies until you win, or die. Good Luck

_________________________________________________________

Controls:  AD- Move Left or right, W- Jump,  Left click (Mouse) - Shoot,  R- Reset game, Esc- Exits game. 

Codes Made By: Danial

Music Made By: Youhanna

Characters/Background made by: Eunsoo 

It is advisable to use headphones and a mouse, might experience lag, if do refresh the page. 

                      Game is still in development, official release coming soon!

Official release will include:

More mazes, Harder enemies....

Game made by GameMakerStudio 2.
